comment: MPA Fundamentals of Public Admin. Incredibly caring, understanding, always making sure students feel supported. Lectures are insightful & engaging. Papers and exams were consistently fair, with clear instructions provided for every assignment. This clarity meant there was no reason for any student to struggle or fail if they followed her guidance.

10/10 amazing. One of the best at Kennesaw. Participation matters but she makes the lectures so easy going to where you would want to speak and give your opinion! Took her for fundamentals of Public Admin.
